about_the_game: VED is a story-driven, hand-drawn RPG with a unique turn-based combat system and roguelite elements. The demo showcases all the key mechanics of the game and immerses players in the magical world of VED.
detailed_description: VED is a story-driven, hand-drawn RPG with a unique turn-based combat system and roguelite elements. The demo showcases all the key mechanics of the game and immerses players in the magical world of VED.
legal_notice: © 2024 Fulqrum Publishing Ltd. Developed by UAB Karaclan. All rights reserved.
name: VED Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM / OpenGL 2.1+ support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: VED is a story-driven, hand-drawn RPG with a unique turn-based combat system and roguelite elements. The demo showcases all the key mechanics of the game and immerses players in the magical world of VED.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
